note: Living in Geneva but originally from Venice in Italy, Mirco Many is part of this generation of DJs who have expanded the House scene in Switzerland. Since the eighties, he has been producing house music and presenting numerous radio programs such as Dance Underground, Funk, Disco, Soul and Hip-Hop house... Throughout his nightlife activities and events, Mirco becomes increasingly popular where he collaborated with several renown international DJs within the House Underground music scene.
